Write composable CSS that's co-located with your components for
                complete modularity. Unique generated class names keep the
                specificity low while eliminating style clashes. Ship only the
                styles that are on the page for the best performance.

defaultMessage:
Enjoy the best DX and code your app at the speed of thought! Your
    saved changes to the CSS and JS are reflected instantaneously
    without refreshing the page. Preserve application state even when
    you update something in the underlying code!
message:
Enjoy the best DX and code your app at the speed of thought! Your
                saved changes to the CSS and JS are reflected instantaneously
                without refreshing the page. Preserve application state even when
                you update something in the underlying code!

defaultMessage: Scalable apps need to support multiple languages, easily add and support multiple languages with `react-intl`.

It's natural to want to add pages (e.g. '/about') to your
                application, and routing makes this possible.

defaultMessage:

  and sagas - and their tests - right from the CLI!

defaultMessage: A highly scalable, offline-first foundation with the best DX and a focus on performance and best practices
message: A highly scalable, offline-first foundation with the best DX and a focus on performance and best practices

defaultMessage: Welcome to Jamdates! Lets set up a jam date for you.
message: Welcome to Jamdates! Lets set up a jam date for you.

defaultMessage: Choose genres you'd like to play in. We'll put you together will people with similar musical style.
message: Choose genres you'd like to play in. We'll put you together will people with similar musical style.

defaultMessage: Select your skill level. It's important that you are honest here, as we use this to find similar musicians to play with you
Beginner - 1-2 years of experience, know the basics and able to play simple songs
Mid-level - played for some years, good technique and able to play a wide variety of songs
Skilled - played for many years, able to improvise and pick up melodies as you here them
Professional - Highly skilled, plays (or could as well play) professionaly
Great! Lastly, enter your contact info and we will contact you as soon as we have put together a group for you.
You'll get asked to pick a few tunes for the jam, or if you'd rather just jam. Then we'll quickly find a time that fits for everyone!

Perfect. Oh one last thing. In order for us to find some really fitting people for you to play with, we need more people onboard. If you share this link with your friends, it would probably help us both a lot!
